body: query {orderbycustomerlist (customer: "24f7c851-29d4-4af9-87c5-0298fa74c689") { orders { id, amount, session { id }, customer { firstname, lastname, address { line1, line2, city, state, zip } }, products { amount, quantity, product { id } }, rebill { id }, date }, pagination { count, end_cursor, has_next_page } } }
